name: US Bank Better Top Navigation Menus (desktop)
description:
Corrects padding and adds hover styles to the top nav menus on the U.S. Bank Online Banking site (desktop version).

U.S. Bank's default styles require you to click exactly on the nav link text to activate it, but confusingly they display a pointer (hand) cursor over the entire link - even the non-clickable areas. What's more, there is no visual indication of which link you're hovering over, and the links are padded oddly so that a click doesn't necessarily land where you would expect.

This user style fixes all of those issues.
